Description: Part of the blade of a bifacial knife: of brown flint, pressure flaked over the whole surface and sharpened on both edges. Broken off at each end.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Semerkhet, Bears excavator's mark, U.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), 8, pl.XV, group marked U, 4th from bottom.
